import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import styles from '../css/shop.module.css' import firebase from '../config/Firebase' const Shop = () => { const [Loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [Products, setProducts] = useState(null) const db = firebase.firestore(); const storage = firebase.storage(); useEffect(() => { db.collection('products').get().then((result) => { setProducts(result.docs); setLoading(false) }); }, []) return (

} {Products && Products.map(product => { console.log(product.image) return (

{product.data().name}

{product.data().price}

) })}
) } export default Shop
